items.sentence: I wonder whether Tom really said that or not.
Tom knows that Mary shouldn\'t eat shellfish.
Tom leaned over and whispered in Mary\'s ear.
Tom didn\'t have enough money to take a taxi.
Tom didn\'t have the nerve to tell the truth.
Women live longer than men in most countries.
I bet it won\'t be long before Tom gets here.
Tom didn\'t see anything out of the ordinary.
Tom usually drinks a lot less than Mary does.
Tom should\'ve done it the way you suggested.
Do you really think I should see a therapist?
The doorman refused to let Tom into the club.
Tom was surprised how easy it was to do that.
Tom was surprised how hard it was to do that.
Tom was surprised how well Mary spoke French.
How many patients do we have on life support?
I saw Tom and Mary on the beach this morning.
I saw Tom and Mary taking a walk in the park.
I don\'t feel like eating anything right now.
Tom wants to talk to you about what happened.
